title: Naturopathic Medicine
cleaned_text: Naturopathic Medicine Naturopathic physicians (NDs) are primary care providers who treat the whole person. The naturopathic scope of practice includes laboratory and clinical diagnosis, botanical medicine, nutrition, elements of Western medicine and other traditional global healing methods. NDs tailor their treatment protocols to suit each patient and place a strong emphasis on preventive care, nutrition, and self-care. - Careers [Career
